Machinio.com | Senior Ruby/Rails developer | Anywhere | Full-time | 55K

Machinio is a startup based in downtown Chicago. We are a search engine for industrial machinery and equipment. We seek inquisitive, self-motivated developers to join our team and work remotely.

Help us solve problems in full-text search, domain specific search optimization, large scale email alert delivery and optimization, custom CRM solutions and everything that makes our customers happy.

To apply: Send resume and answers to the questions to careers@machinio.com only.
